mapper.update: update reply set r_contents = #{r_contents} where r_no = #{r_no}
mapper.select: select /*+ INDEX_desc(r XPK댓글) INDEX_asc(p pk_prj_info) INDEX_asc(i XPK초대) INDEX_asc(e XPK외부회원정보)*/ r.r_no, r.r_contents, r.r_date, r.p_no, r.info_no, e.exter_mem_name as name, r.taged_name From reply r join prj_info p on r.info_no = p.info_no join invite i on p.invite_no = i.invite_no join total_member t on i.total_m_no = t.total_m_no join external_m_info e on t.exter_m_no = e.exter_m_no where r.p_no=#{p_no}

select /*+ INDEX_desc(r XPK댓글) INDEX_asc(p pk_prj_info) INDEX_asc(i XPK초대) INDEX_asc(im XPK내부회원정보)*/ r.r_no, r.r_contents, r.r_date, r.p_no, r.info_no, im.member_name as name, r.taged_name From reply r join prj_info p on r.info_no = p.info_no join invite i on p.invite_no = i.invite_no join total_member t on i.total_m_no = t.total_m_no join inter_m_info im on t.member_no = im.member_no where r.p_no =#{p_no}
select r_no from reply where ROWNUM=1 order by r_no desc

select DISTINCT p.info_no,e.exter_mem_name as name,tm.total_m_no from prj_info p join invite i on p.invite_no = i.invite_no join total_member tm on i.total_m_no = tm.total_m_no join external_m_info e on tm.exter_m_no = e.exter_m_no where i.pjt_no =#{pjt_no}

select DISTINCT p.info_no ,im.member_name as name,tm.total_m_no from prj_info p join invite i on p.invite_no = i.invite_no join total_member tm on i.total_m_no = tm.total_m_no join inter_m_info im on tm.member_no = im.member_no where i.pjt_no =#{pjt_no}
select tag_no from tag where ROWNUM=1 order by tag_no desc
select DISTINCT tm.total_m_no from prj_info p join invite i on p.invite_no = i.invite_no join total_member tm on i.total_m_no = tm.total_m_no where p.info_no =#{info_no}
